Name: Modo Defence
About the game: Modo Defense is a strategy tower defense game. You can obtain various resources by spinning yut, which is similar to a dice, and use them to summon towers, strengthen towers, or use items that give additional abilities. As a new mountain god, the player must learn how to use the jangseung and treasures and defend the village from ghosts. Players can freely combine the treasures of Jangseung. You can build towers that are single-hit or multi-attack. Depending on how you combine the treasures, the difficulty can be made easier or harder. You can make the game easier by clearing the map and enhancing your attributes with the stars you get. Challenge yourself to see how many rounds you can last and which map you can reach! Spin the yut! You can get numbers by spinning yut and summon jangseung. If you're lucky, you might be able to move your piece all the way. Combine treasures! Higher tier towers can contain treasure. Depending on how you combine treasures, it can be additive or multiplicative. Freely combine treasures! Various maps! There are many types of maps. How far can you beat the maps that get more difficult as you go further?
